column4: anybody knows how can i make my mp3player writeable? i mean after connecting it to usb i can read files and i think i can change their content, but i can't add any file to it.
how did u try to add files?
every way -> drag&drop in konqueror, from console, from console as root...
it is mounted with these options: rw,noexec,nosuid,nodev,sync,quiet,uid=1000,gid=1000,umask=077,iocharset=utf8
